alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:47PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Storm With High Surf Possible Sunday Night Through Monday Night... South winds of 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph over the Bering and Chukchi Seas on Sunday will spread to the West Coast of Alaska Sunday night into Monday. This will bring the possibility of high surf and minor coastal flooding to the West Coast of Alaska from Golovin north to Point Hope from Sunday night into Monday night. A strong storm moving into the Western Bering and Chukchi Seas on Sunday will move along the West Coast of Alaska on Monday. This will bring a mix of rain and snow to the West Coast west of Golovin and Kotzebue Sunday night and Monday along with the strong south winds.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island
